sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Update Min Word Count value with default value in Gen Ai config</description> <name>Update Min word count in Gen Ai config</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_generative_ai_config"); gr.addNullQuery("min_word_count"); gr.query(); while(gr.next()){ gr.setValue("min_word_count","-1"); gr.update(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>rahul.kumar@snc</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-12-18 09:38:45</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0f39dd3fc3c3b150f09fbee015013143</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update Min word count in Gen Ai config</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Glide OneExtend" source="com.glide.one_extend">dc98175b47220210cd4e1ce4316d4324</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_0f39dd3fc3c3b150f09fbee015013143</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>rahul.kumar@snc</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-12-18 09:38:45</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Update Min word count in Gen Ai config
